name: v6.0-Alpha3
body:
## New under the hood
- Added a boot receiver so the app can work as soon as the device is booted and ready
- All fragments have been rewritten for FragmentCompat (About and Settings activities)
- Added option to reset the cell radio to default settings #67 

## UI/UX
- Redesigned some layouts for better looks
- Implemented [DayNight theming](https://developer.android.com/guide/topics/ui/look-and-feel/darktheme) for the whole app
- Migrated all [MaterialDrawer](https://github.com/mikepenz/MaterialDrawer) code
- Added Bootup events to statistics (WIP)

## Libraries/SDKs
- Updated all libraries
- Removed Glide
- Removed Fabric.io

## Optimizations
- Implemented [LibSU](https://github.com/topjohnwu/libsu) for all superuser commands
- Improved Main activity load times and general performance with Async
- Rewrote core JobService processes
- Rewrote BroadcastReceivers
- Proguard optimize file now being used
- Testing some gradle optimizations

## Cleanup
- Removed some images
- Converted many hardcoded strings

## Fixes
- Null pointer bugs
- Fixed Battery Optimization bug #65

name: v5.0.3 - Beta8
body:
## Kotlin
- RadioControl classes are now 100% Kotlin!

## Libraries/SDKs
- Updated all libraries
- Migrated Android Support libraries to AndroidX
- Targeting latest SDK

## Cleanups
- General cleanup
- Optimized Imports
- Fixed typos
- Removed old IAB classes
- Reorganizing MainActivity for better readability
- Separating Utilities file into smaller separate Utilities classes (AlarmSchedulers)
- Removed app_wear module

## Dialogs:
- Overhauling dialogs with MaterialDialog 2.0 beta
- Fixing issues with old dialogs

## Fixes
- Fixed  issue with boot receiving

## New Translations:
- Spanish
- Turkish

name: v5.0.3 - Beta 7
body:
- Fixes for Alternate root command setting
- Fixed wording on previous network settings

name: v5.0.3 - Beta6
body:
- Android P improvements(Maybe)
- Changed long tasks to kotlin Async(Smooth)
- Added animation duration to statistics
- Added boot receiver
- Made statistics FAB smarter

- Known bugs: 
- App may crash on boot

name: v5.0.3-Beta5
body:
- Fixed phone call checker, more reliable
- Fixed root access class OutputStream  closing and better handling of termination
- Made Background Airplane Service more reliable
- Converted most icon images to vector drawables
- Implemented About Libraries
- Changed What's New dialog to dark theme

name: v5.0.3-Beta4
body:
- More files converted to Kotlin
- Fixed Airplane service time not being accurate
- Images resized

name: v5.0.2-Beta3
body:
- Converted a few classes to Kotlin for testing
- Added Adaptive icons
- Fixed persistence being killed in some instances, Notification should fix that issue

name: v5.0.2
body:
- Removed Ads!
- Added prompt for resetting airplane mode
- Possible fix for background service
- Removed some false positive virus #63

name: v5.0.1
body:
- Made PersistenceService more persistent
- Fixed a crash in cell status checking mode
- Structural change to MainActivity to improve response time and persistence
- Fixed small issue with Firebase logging at launch getting disabled

name: v5.0 - Release
body:
#### Features

- **New!** Automatic airplane mode checker
- **New!** Do not Disturb mode
- **New!** Firebase Analytics (Opt-in)
- **New!** Fabric Crashlytics (Opt-in)
- **New!** Intelligent Detection mode
- **New!** Night mode
- **New!** Standby mode
- **New!** The app can detect a call and turn the cell radio back on for seamless call experience

### Permissions
- **New!** Coarse location permission for cell radio fix

### Fixes & Optimizations
- Converted foreground services to background services
- Optimized images and files
- Fixed statistics bug
- Fixed Network Settings memory leak
- Fixed standby bug

name: v5.0 - Beta 3
body:
#### Fixes

- Fixed some wording and spelling
- May have made WifiReceiver smarter(Or dumber)
- Added fix for broken analytics
- Fixed possible memory leak in WakeupReceiver (Shows up as com.nikhilparanjape.radiocontrol:remote)

#### Improvements

- Updated libraries
- Removed Optimization checker in drawer
- Removed unused imports
- Made intelligent mode default for Nougat+

name: v5.0 - Beta 2
body:
#### Fixes
- Added some oreo fixes

#### Improvement
- Added answers API to feedback button
- Cleaned up persistence service
- Added some donation tracking(anonymous) - All this does is tell me when someone has donated. No data, just date/time, and donation amount.

name: v5.0 - Beta 1
body:
## *New!*
- The current v4.1 beta is a big step up from v4.0 so I have decided to upgrade to v5.0
- New Intelligent Mode(Might work better with Background Optimization)
- Added way to bind WifiReceiver to MainActivity and make it
unkillable
- Added code to make sure the background service stays awake
- Added WifiReceiver codebase to PersistenceService, disabled internet
access alert temporarily
- Added battery optimization toggle(From Android settings)
- Adds new permission for doze

## Fixes
- Fixed possible memory leak for Android N devices

## Other Changes
- Changed wording for firebase analytics
- Changed some layouts and icons
- Changed analytics dialog

## Optimizations
- Optimized code
- Optimized Statistics activity launch delay
- Optimized WifiReceiver for Android N+

## Known Issues
- Open Source licenses button will crash

name: v4.1 - Beta 11
body:
- Added Fabric Crashlytics
- Added a force crash test button
- Added standby mode
- Fixed deprecated methods
- Fixed location crash(added try catch)
- ~~Added proguard(Took me long enough)~~ Failed to launch for some devices. Removed for now :(
- Added v2 APK Signature

name: v4.1 - Beta 10
body:
- Attempting to fix sleep bug (DON'T USE AIRPLANE SERVICE WITH ROOT CMD)
- Changed most BroadcastReceivers to Wakelocks
- Migrated CellService to IntentService(background)
- Fixed Phone Call Check for Alternate Cell Command
- Fixed memory leak in WifiReceiver

name: v4.1 - Beta 9
body:
- Optimized background airplane service when checking for connectivity
- Added Firebase Analytics EULA
- Changed SAS to BAS
- Added module for update checker
- Fixed SSL for About page
- Fixed reboot bug

name: v4.1 - Beta 8
body:
- Added Firebase Crash Reporting
- Fixed possible memory leak in Network Settings
- Optimized images by converting PNG to WEBP
- Updated Gradle
- Updated ScheduledAirplane service to match WifiReceiver
- Removed unnecessary tests under link speed test
- ReadPhoneState permission added to check if user is in call, and will turn off airplane mode/turn on cell radio
- Added solution to #42 under settings

name: v4.1 - Beta7
body:
- Removed android wear module (Will rework when AW 2.0 is released)
- Finally fixed cell radio detection, should work flawlessly
- Working on log directory so it's more user accessible

name: v4.1 - Beta6
body:
- Working on cell radio check
- New splash screen, should work on any device and not stretch
- Added course location for cell radio

name: v4.1 - Beta5
body:
- Cell Radio fix should work better
- Added Pixel support

name: v4.1 - Beta4
body: - Alternate root mode added. This explicitly disables the cell radio and is not related to Airplane mode. To enable this, first turn off WiFi, and wait for LTE/3G to show up. Then go into the app settings and click Alternate root command. Enable WiFi, and you will notice that the cell bars have gone blank. That means it worked!

name: v4.1 - Beta3
body:
- Changed scheduled service to have alarmmanager
- Added TimedAlarmReceiver to start the airplane service at a specified interval
- Do Not Disturb will stop all alarms and wake them back up in the specified hours
- Night mode should work(Still experimental as there is no way to turn it off, besides from developer options on main screen)

name: v4.1 - Beta2
body:
- Fixed statistics loading bug (app index problem)
- Added time picker(Theme is kinda broken)
- Added do not disturb option(Not working)
- Nothing new with the wear app

name: v4.1 - Beta1
body:
- Added scheduled service to check if airplane mode is on or not(with list for choosing minutes)
- Added support for Wear app(Will add voice actions for latency test, etc.)
- General performance fixes

name: v4.0 - Release
body:
### New Features
- Logging feature
- Localization support
- Open source licenses
- Statistics

### UI Changes
- Easier UI with tutorial screen
- Splash screen to cover up long loading time on slower devices
- Changed Ping to Latency

### General Fixes
- Better changelog
- Fixed network settings
- Switched PreferenceActivity to Fragments

### Bug Fixes
- Disconnect and Root bug

name: v4.0 - RC 5
body:
- FAB Button for latency test
- Snackbars now use coordinator layout

name: v4.0 - RC 4
body:
- Cleaned up code
- Completely fixed latency snackbar, I swear, it's the last time
- Moved WifiReceiver to receiver package
- Made graphs dashed

name: v4.0 - RC 3
body:
- Actually fixed the ping test snackbar
- Fixed carrier logo

name: v4.0 - RC2
body: - Fixed latency test snackbar

name: v4.0 - RC 1
body:
- Changed Ping to Latency
- Fixed graph animation
- Fixed licenses not showing on cell data
- Added fab button to stat view
